Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.meta

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CategCell
    a cell which has some attached MetaInfo
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MetaInfo
    Immutable class describing a piece of metadata.
    MetaInfoGenerator
    a caching generator of MetaInfo, used for saving memory and GC runtime
    NOT THREAD SAFE
    TODO: in case this approach turns out to be too memory-hungry, we could move instances of this class from column fetchers to NiReportsEngine and make the cache concurrent This class does not use any lambdas or other fancy stuff, because it is on the critical performance path
    MetaInfoSet
    holds the metadata of a cell, indexed by category for O(1) lookup
    This is an append-only datastructure by design
    This class is in the critical path; no nice code here - all we care about is speed and client code expressivity
    Java does not have extension methods, so we live with what we can
